description: This file defines an Angular component called 'FormFieldComponent' which provides a labeled input area with optional hint and error messages. It is used as a reusable UI widget within a larger Angular application.

classes.name: FormFieldComponent
classes.description: Angular component providing label, hint, and error slot functionalities for form input fields.

methods.name: label
methods.description: Input property for the label text associated with the input.

methods.name: forId
methods.description: Input property for the 'for' attribute ID linking label to input.

methods.name: hint
methods.description: Input property for optional hint text displayed below the input.

methods.name: error
methods.description: Input property for displaying error messages.
